Ajax 跨域访问

“ajax access origin resource”

问题现象当出现跨域访问的时候， ajax 通常会报类似如下错误：XMLHttpRequest cannot load http://localhost:8000/simple/api/users/me/login. Response to preflight request doesn't pass access control check: No 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin' header is present on the requested resource.
